name: CorePromises
summary:
CorePromises brings Promises to Swift and enables beautiful multi-thread
                        and typesafe Swift code.
description:
CorePromises makes heavy use of generics to bring promises to Swift.
                        Asynchronous networking and asynchronous programming in general is greatly
                        facilitated. The framework is particularly useful when working with
                        Apple's Dispatch, Alamofire or WebParsing.
